text: Niccayamaka nirakarippavarkal, allahvin pataiyai vittum tatuppatarkaka tankal celvankalai celavu ceykinranar; (ivvare avarkal totarntu) avarrai celavu ceytu kontirupparkal - mutivil (atu) avarkalukke tukkamaka amaintuvitum; pinnar avarkal verri kollappatuvarkal; (irutiyil) nirakarippavarkal narakattil onru cerkkappatuvarkal
